fields.name: Male literacy rate (Schofield (1973))
fields.description: Percentage of men who signed their name in writing for marriage registers, for England. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).

fields.description: Percentage of witnesses who sign ecclesiastical court declarations, for the tradesmen and craftsmen in the dioceses of Norwich. Original data is in Table 7.3 (pg 146) provides the percentage who are illiterate. To arrive at current estimates: % who are literate = 100 - (% who are illiterate).
